page.title: 19EDUCATION
page.content: Our area has educational facilities for everyone from age 4 onwards. There are 4 Primary Schools - {Dunnikier, Dunearn, North, West}-which all have nurseries attached.At the age of four children attend nursery for five half days every week.After this they attend primary till the age of 12 when they transfer to senior school. {Balwearie High School}is a comprehensive school which caters for pupils aged 12 to 18.Pupils may leave school at the age of 16 if they wish and either find employment or attend the local technical college. {Kirkcaldy Technical College}caters for most types of further education. Courses can be day release, part time, full time or evening classes.The technical college also has a computer centre at Priory Park.
